'''Shitoki''' is a quest-exclusive NPC who appears at [[Tsurumi Island]] after the players complete the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Sun-Wheel and Mt. Kanna]]''. He is a long lost soul who wishes to find his brother's treasure.
